songs.title: Deserve Me
songs.lyric: Finally stopped calling/nTryna forget your face and put these thoughts to rest/nCan I move on? Gotta get this off my chest/nWanna feel light as a feather, just wanna feel okay, is that okay?/nBack on the road/nYou just had to make it harder than it already was/nAlways gotta take you farther till you're at your worse/nWhy you so petty? Now you're bitter and it shows (eh-eh)/nYeah, it shows/nI like it better when you're gone/nI feel a little less alone/nYou know I never needed you/nDidn't deserve me/nYou don't deserve me/nYou see the world through tired eyes/nDeep down you gotta know you're wrong/nYou know I never needed you/nDidn't deserve me, oh/nYou don't deserve me, no/n(You don't deserve me, no)/nYou don't deserve the love I give you/nMake me wanna take the pussy back (back)/nYou don't even know how to act (act)/nI don't deserve the shit you put me through (ooh-ooh)/nLike you don't know that you're lucky/nMake a cute nigga feel ugly/nLike I got time for callin' you (callin')/nLike, what you doin'? (What you doin'?)/nWatchin' you (watchin' you) like how you movin', ah/nBut I think I just might fuck you one last time to be sure (sure)/nIf you walk through that door/nDon't come creeping through my window/nI know that you kept your key/nYeah, yo fui la que siempre te di de todo/nY pa' ti eso nunca fue suficiente/nNow my love ain't what it used to be/nYou just don't get it or maybe you just got used to me/nDo you know how many motherfuckers want this pussy exclusively?/nYou ain't the only one tryna be the only one/nWise up, man, 'cause you're lookin' real dumb/nI like it better when you're gone/nI feel a little less alone/nYou know I never needed you/nDidn't deserve me (no)/nYou don't deserve me (no)/nYou see the world through tired eyes/nDeep down you gotta know you're wrong (ay-ay)/nDeep down I always should've known (ay-ay)/nYou don't deserve me (no)/nDidn't deserve me (no)/nYou don't deserve me, no/nYou know it, you're so manipulative/nI need you to know that you're so manipulative/nYou know it, first you're bitter, then you're sweet/nYou think you're so discreet/nI see what you did there, what you doin' to me/nYou played yourself the saddest violin/nI bet you thought I didn't see it comin'/nYou had me hangin' on a string/nI let it go, let it go, let it go, now can you let go of me?/nLet go of me, let go of me, let go of me, let go of me/nLet go of me, let go of me, let go of me, let go of me
